title: Open Position: Researcher / PhD Candidate
intro: We are looking for a highly motivated candidate to join our research group. The position offers the opportunity to work on interdisciplinary projects in a collaborative and international environment.

sections.heading: Your Responsibilities
body: You will contribute to ongoing research projects, collaborate with team members, and support the dissemination of results through publications and presentations.
items: Conduct independent research within the scope of the group’s activities.
Contribute to joint publications and conference presentations.
Collaborate with international partners and project members.
Support the supervision of students when appropriate.

sections.heading: Your Profile
body: We are looking for a candidate with a strong interest in research and an openness to interdisciplinary collaboration.
items: Master’s degree (or equivalent) in a relevant field.
Good command of written and spoken English.
Ability to work both independently and in a team.

sections.heading: What We Offer
body: We offer a stimulating research environment with access to excellent infrastructure and opportunities for professional development.
items: An internationally oriented and supportive research group.
Opportunities to attend conferences and workshops.
Possibility to develop your own research ideas within the group’s scope.

contact.text: If you are interested in this position, please send your application including a CV, a short motivation letter, and contact details of two referees.
